channel.title: PSD button to GIMP button
channel.description:
Yeah, well this is for all the people who think gimp is noob or w/e you call it. Gimp is actually as good as photoshop in a wierd way, but you got to know what your doing and have experience. Theres a lot of thinking behind wut designs you do too, such as this design... Took me a while to think about how i would do the white shiny part of the button
It can be found here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=post;board=29.0
Comment and rate please, thanks. Especially the ones who did both or at least one.

item.title: PSD button to GIMP button
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“Archer, post:5, topic:270280”][quote author=Server-Unknown.Net link=topic=356722.msg2727911#msg2727911 date=1238505269]
Well first thats my account, RodsGFX and I made that button. Uhh, it makes me feel more confortable and help me realise I dont really need photoshop since im pro gimper.
[/quote]

I guess you didn’t read STH’s post, the link goes to the post a thread page.[/quote]

And I also guess you didn’t read it, because that didn’t answer my question at all.

You sir, are NO pro gimper.

How does it make you spend more time design-wise. Creating a concept first. Etc.

Read full topic
